titleInfo.title: Letter, Anna Jones in Allegheny City, Pa. to David L. Jones in Nashville, Tenn., 1865 June 20

mods.abstract: 20th June 1865 Anna M. Jones in Allegheny City, Pa. to her husband David L. Jones in Nashville, Tenn. Expresses regret at not having heard from him for a while. Makes him aware of what takes up most of her time; but, knowing the war is over, she is consumed by thoughts of when he might be coming home. She has no desire to take part in social events, with or without their children, while he is away. Makes the case again for getting a sewing machine, which David is not in favor of, to help with needed income.
